meanings.definition: The flesh of a horse used as food.
meanings.sent1: Some people eat horseflesh in certain countries.
meanings.sent2: The butcher displayed horseflesh in the market.
meanings.sent3: At the exotic restaurant, they serve horseflesh burgers.
meanings.sent4: The idea of eating horseflesh may seem strange to some.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cooking horseflesh filled the air.

meanings.sent1: The majestic horseflesh galloped across the field.
meanings.sent2: She brushed the horseflesh gently to remove dirt.
meanings.sent3: The children admired the shiny coat of the horseflesh.
meanings.sent4: His strength was compared to that of horseflesh.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the horseflesh was captivating.
